T02TD2496E:254b-1: k'a ya b'a ka tsitta su pra tishtha n'a ma /
T02TD2496E:254b-3: sku dang gsung dang thugs rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2496E:254b-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2496E:255a-2: gus pas phyag 'tshal rten gsum la //
T02TD2496E:255a-3: rgyud dang bla ma'i gsung brten nas //
T02TD2496E:255a-4: sgrib sbyong rab gnas bri bar bya //
T02TD2496E:255a-5: slob dpon de nyid bcu shes shing //
T02TD2496E:255a-6: mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2496E:255a-7: phyag rgya sngags dang cho ga shes //
T02TD2496E:255a-8: las rnams kun la mkhas pa ste //
T02TD2496E:255a-9: dam sdom byang chub sems 'byongs pas //
T02TD2496E:255a-10: bsnyen pa rnam gsum rdzogs byas la //
T02TD2496E:255a-11: de dang 'dra ba'i grogs bcas kyis //
T02TD2496E:255a-12: dus zla gza' skar tshes grangs ni //
T02TD2496E:255a-13: nyi ma'i khyim ni bcu gnyis te //
T02TD2496E:255a-14: dgu na dpyid ra 'bring ro hi ta'i //
T02TD2496E:255a-15: dus su nyi ma log nas ni //
T02TD2496E:255a-17: de drug zhi ba rab gnas shig //
T02TD2496E:255a-18: dbyar ston ra 'bring zla drug lhor //
T02TD2496E:255a-19: nag 'phel drag nyi der mi brtsam //
T02TD2496E:255a-20: phur bu lag dang pa ba sangs //
T02TD2496E:255a-21: zla ba bzang ldan gza' de shis //
T02TD2496E:255a-22: nyi spen dmag dpon nor 'joms ngan //
T02TD2496E:255a-23: chu smad snar ma gro bzhin dang /
T02TD2496E:255a-24: lag dang snon snubs rgyal chu stod //
T02TD2496E:255a-25: khrums smad skye dgu 'phel ba dang //
T02TD2496E:255a-26: rab tu gnas pa'i mchog tu byed //
T02TD2496E:255a-27: yid 'dod dngos grub me bzhi ste //
T02TD2496E:255a-28: snrubs dang gro bzhin de bzhin te //
T02TD2496E:255a-29: lag gis skal bzang snar mas rgyal //
T02TD2496E:255a-30: mgo yis nye bar zhi bar byed //
T02TD2496E:255a-31: chu stod kyis ni bu dag gson //
T02TD2496E:255a-32: khrums smad rtag par dngos grub ster //
T02TD2496E:255a-33: rgyal gyis tshe ring brtan par 'gyur //
T02TD2496E:255a-34: snon gyis mchog tu bde bar byed //
T02TD2496E:255a-35: lha mtshams kyis na mi cho ga ster 'gyur //
T02TD2496E:255a-36: gza' dang skar ma de dag kyang //
T02TD2496E:255a-37: dar gud mi rigs las dang sbyar //
T02TD2496E:255a-38: tshes gcig gsum lnga drug bdun bcu //
T02TD2496E:255a-39: drug po nor 'joms spang gzhan shis //
T02TD2496E:255a-40: gza' skar tshes grangs mthun 'dzom na //
T02TD2496E:255a-41: mar gyi ngo la'ang bya bar shis //
T02TD2496E:255a-42: gnam stong bcu bzhi kun du spang //
T02TD2496E:255a-43: zla ba gza' dang skar ma dang //
T02TD2496E:255a-44: nyi ma dus 'dzom skad cig la /
T02TD2496E:255a-45: ji skad gsungs pa bzhin byas na //
T02TD2496E:255a-46: bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //
T02TD2496E:255a-47: rab tu gnas pa mchog 'gyur te //
T02TD2496E:255a-48: 'khor los sgyur rgyal dbang phyug ni //
T02TD2496E:255a-50: slob dpon mtshan ma thob pa na //
T02TD2496E:255a-51: gza' dang rgyu skar brtsi mi dgos //
T02TD2496E:255a-52: bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'ang med //
T02TD2496E:255b-0: @255b gza' rnams thams cad rjes mthun zhing //
T02TD2496E:255b-1: bgegs dang rgyu skar lha rnams nyid //
T02TD2496E:255b-2: de drug bka' sgrub kun gnas shing //
T02TD2496E:255b-3: gzugs brnyan mchod rten la sogs kyi //
T02TD2496E:255b-4: dngos grub dag ni ster bar mdzad //
T02TD2496E:255b-5: yid kyis cung zad gang bsams pa //
T02TD2496E:255b-7: yang thog mchod rten la sogs gnas //
T02TD2496E:255b-8: khyim dang lha yi gnas rnams su //
T02TD2496E:255b-9: sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas bya //
T02TD2496E:255b-10: brdungs lugs 'bur bris sogs rten ni //
T02TD2496E:255b-11: rang rang mtshan nyid ldan pa ste //
T02TD2496E:255b-12: zhi khro la sogs rang tshul mthun //
T02TD2496E:255b-13: tshad kyis tshad la phab cing bzang //
T02TD2496E:255b-15: bzlog pa skyon 'gyur de phyir gzab //
T02TD2496E:255b-16: rab gnas dgos dang mi dgos gnyis //
T02TD2496E:255b-17: dam pa'i don du dpyad pa na //
T02TD2496E:255b-18: gang zhig gang gis gang du brlab //
T02TD2496E:255b-19: gdod ma nas zhi skye med la //
T02TD2496E:255b-20: ji 'dra ji ltar rab tu gnas //
T02TD2496E:255b-21: chos rnams thams cad 'od gsal la du //
T02TD2496E:255b-22: rtog dang ldan pa'i mchod gnas la //
T02TD2496E:255b-23: rab tu gnas pa mi dgos te //
T02TD2496E:255b-24: yang na stong nyid ma rtogs kyang //
T02TD2496E:255b-25: mchod rten glegs bam sku gzugs sogs //
T02TD2496E:255b-26: sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul byin rlabs las //
T02TD2496E:255b-27: byung ba min na mi 'byung bar //
T02TD2496E:255b-28: rtogs te shin tu dad ldan na //
T02TD2496E:255b-29: rab tu gnas pa mi dgos so //
T02TD2496E:255b-30: dang po'i las can ma 'byongs la //
T02TD2496E:255b-31: 'jig rten tha snyad kun rdzob tu //
T02TD2496E:255b-32: 'gro bas de nyid mi shes la //
T02TD2496E:255b-33: ston pas rab tu gnas pa bshad //
T02TD2496E:255b-34: dbye ba sgra don skyon yon las //
T02TD2496E:255b-35: bya ba'i thabs dang rnam pa drug / don dam spros med rab gnas dang //
T02TD2496E:255b-36: kun rdzob sku gsung thugs gsum ste //
T02TD2496E:255b-37: yon tan phrin las zhor la 'byung //
T02TD2496E:255b-38: dam tshig sems dpa' sbyangs bskyed la //
T02TD2496E:255b-39: ye shes sems dpa' yun ring du //
T02TD2496E:255b-40: gnas pa'i phyir ni rab tu gnas //
T02TD2496E:255b-41: gang du sku gzugs rdzogs pa la //
T02TD2496E:255b-42: byin ma brlabs par ring gnas na //
T02TD2496E:255b-43: de la bkra mi shis 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2496E:255b-44: de srid mchod par de mi 'os //
T02TD2496E:255b-45: dper na skyes bu la la zhig / rig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pan //
T02TD2496E:255b-46: 'jig rten kun gyis mchod mi byed //
T02TD2496E:255b-47: de bzhin byin ma brlabs sku la //
T02TD2496E:256a-2: dam tshig bral zhing sngags dman te //
T02TD2496E:256a-3: sbyin sreg thal ba 'bras med mtshungs //
T02TD2496E:256a-4: 'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud chen las //
T02TD2496E:256a-6: bde 'gro mtho ris yod min la //
T02TD2496E:256a-7: bde ba mchog tu 'ang mi 'gyur na //
T02TD2496E:256a-8: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams ni //
T02TD2496E:256a-10: ta la'i mgo bcad sngo min ltar //
T02TD2496E:256a-11: de bzhin sngags sgrub rmongs pa dang //
T02TD2496E:256a-12: tshul khrims nyams shing sdig las byed //
T02TD2496E:256a-13: rtag tu bud med chags pa la //
T02TD2496E:256a-14: 'di ni rab tu bsten ma yin //
T02TD2496E:256a-15: mi dge bshes gnyen bsten bas ni //
T02TD2496E:256a-16: sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub //
T02TD2496E:256a-17: yon tan yang ni rtsa rgyud las //
T02TD2496E:256a-18: 'jig rten sngags rnams ji snyed dang //
T02TD2496E:256a-19: de slob bse ru byang chub sems //
T02TD2496E:256a-20: bdag nyid chen pos gsungs pa yin //
T02TD2496E:256a-21: cho ga gzhung dang mthun par ni //
T02TD2496E:256a-22: rab tu gnas pa byas nas kyang //
T02TD2496E:256a-23: ri mo 'di ni mdun bzhag na //
T02TD2496E:256a-25: de bzhin mchod dang phyag 'tshal dang //
T02TD2496E:256a-26: mthong dang reg pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02TD2496E:256a-27: sdig pa'i rnyog pa kun las grol //
T02TD2496E:256a-28: ras ris la sogs mthu chen la //
T02TD2496E:256a-29: don du gnyer dang bskul bas ni //
T02TD2496E:256a-30: myur du skye ba don yod thob //
T02TD2496E:256a-31: rjes su yi rang de bzhin no //
T02TD2496E:256a-32: rten 'di mthong ba'i skye bo yis //
T02TD2496E:256a-33: bsod nams thob pa don yod pa //
T02TD2496E:256a-34: bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang //
T02TD2496E:256a-35: brjod par yang ni mi nus so //
T02TD2496E:256a-36: las ni yon bdag bsod nams spel //
T02TD2496E:256a-37: sngags pas dge ba rnyed par byed //
T02TD2496E:256a-38: de bzhin slob dpon sngags gnas pas //
T02TD2496E:256a-39: chos ldan mchod pa byed pa gang //
T02TD2496E:256a-40: de yis skye bar mchod par 'gyur //
T02TD2496E:256a-41: bya thabs cho ga dag las bya //
T02TD2496E:256a-42: cho ga dman gnas bkra mi shis //
T02TD2496E:256a-45: cho ga'i tshul legs bsod nams ni //
T02TD2496E:256a-46: mthong dang mi mthong rnams su skye //
T02TD2496E:256a-47: sku gzugs sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyis //
T02TD2496E:256a-49: gang zag blo rigs tha dad pas //
T02TD2496E:256a-50: yon mchod 'byor chog tshogs pa yis //
T02TD2496E:256a-51: rab gnas rgyas pa spros bcas bya//
T02TD2496E:256b-0: @256b 'bring pos cho ga tshad tsam dang //
T02TD2496E:256b-1: bsdus pa ting 'dzin thun gcig la //
T02TD2496E:256b-2: rdul tshon la sogs mi dgos bya //
T02TD2496E:256b-3: rgyas pa mtshan ldan bla ma la //
T02TD2496E:256b-4: slob mas lan gsum gsol btab nas //
T02TD2496E:256b-5: bka' bsgo slob mas rdzas ba sogs te //
T02TD2496E:256b-6: yid 'ong gnas su bsnyen gsum bskyal /
T02TD2496E:256b-7: sa yi cho ga gzhung bzhin bya //
T02TD2496E:256b-8: lha bu ma sbyin sreg sa yi lha //
T02TD2496E:256b-9: sta gon spyi dang mthun par bya //
T02TD2496E:256b-10: 'di skabs slob ma sta gon ni //
T02TD2496E:256b-11: gang byed gzhung dang mthun gnas yin //
T02TD2496E:256b-12: de yang sngags grogs slob dpon 'dra //
T02TD2496E:256b-13: yon bdag sta gon gnas pa ni //
T02TD2496E:256b-14: rgyas pa bkra shis cho ga 'di ;
T02TD2496E:256b-15: / brtsams nas yongs su rdzogs kyi bar //
T02TD2496E:256b-16: yon mchod la sogs mi rnams kun //
T02TD2496E:256b-17: lus ngag yid spyod bzang ltas bya //
T02TD2496E:256b-18: ngan pa'i phyogs kun thag ring spang //
T02TD2496E:256b-19: bzang ngan gang byung mi rabs bdun //
T02TD2496E:256b-20: 'byung bas ngan na 'bar sogs bzlog / nang par dkyil 'khor rdzas tshang bsham //
T02TD2496E:256b-21: shar lhor rab gnas dbang stegs ni //
T02TD2496E:256b-22: dpangs khru rgya ni rten dang sbyar //
T02TD2496E:256b-23: ba yi lngas byugs pad 'khor ser //
T02TD2496E:256b-24: nyi nub dpon slob khrus byas brgyan //
T02TD2496E:256b-25: bgegs bskrad chad lhag bskang byas te //
T02TD2496E:256b-26: bum pa'i bsnyen sgrub gzhung ltar bya//
T02TD2496E:256b-27: de yang srung ba'i 'khor lo nas //
T02TD2496E:256b-28: mchod bstod bsgom bzlas bar du ni //
T02TD2496E:256b-29: mtshan ma byung gi bar du bya //
T02TD2496E:256b-30: de rjes rang 'jug dbang yang blang //
T02TD2496E:256b-31: de rjes snyan gsan gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2496E:256b-32: phyir phyin gtor ma rgya chen gtang //
T02TD2496E:256b-33: bgegs la bka' bsgo bden bdar bya //
T02TD2496E:256b-35: sngon du yon bdag dbang rgyas bskur //
T02TD2496E:256b-36: de nas rab gnas sta gon te //
T02TD2496E:256b-37: rten gsar rnams ni der drangs la //
T02TD2496E:256b-39: bgegs la bka' bsgo stang stabs bya //
T02TD2496E:256b-40: khro bo'i bstod bzlas ra dra sogs //
T02TD2496E:256b-41: srung 'khor rgyas par bsgom par bya //
T02TD2496E:256b-42: gong nas rten gsar bzhugs pa na //
T02TD2496E:256b-43: na bza' car g-yogs zhal phyir bstan //
T02TD2496E:256b-44: dkyil 'khor bris nas sta gon te //
T02TD2496E:256b-45: ma bris rab gnas dbang nus med //
T02TD2496E:256b-46: slob dpon brtan ma thob nus med //
T02TD2496E:257a-2: des na rgyud dang bla ma ni //
T02TD2496E:257a-3: dam pa'i snyan brgyud gdams ngag dgos //
T02TD2496E:257a-4: sta gon bgegs ni bskrad pa'i gnad //
T02TD2496E:257a-5: dngos gzhi byin rlabs sbar ba'i gnad //
T02TD2496E:257a-6: rjes ni bstan pa dar rgyas gsum //
T02TD2496E:257a-7: sta gon nub mo phyag rgya dgrol //
T02TD2496E:257a-8: dkyil 'khor shar sogs ku sha'i steng //
T02TD2496E:257a-9: seng ge'i nyal stabs chos nyid nyal //
T02TD2496E:257a-10: skya rengs shar dus chos nyid las //
T02TD2496E:257a-11: langs te khrus byas brgyan ltar bskyed //
T02TD2496E:257a-12: rten gsar tha mal dril spyang phyir //
T02TD2496E:257a-13: shing bu gru gsum me sbar la //
T02TD2496E:257a-14: kham phor steng du bag zan gyi //
T02TD2496E:257a-15: kong bu gsum la mar me sbar //
T02TD2496E:257a-16: 'bras kyi chang bu gsum la ni //
T02TD2496E:257a-17: rdo rje gtsug tor gnod sbyin gyis //
T02TD2496E:257a-18: sku la phyi bkru lan gsum bya //
T02TD2496E:257a-20: sngags gnyis zlos shing yungs kar brab //
T02TD2496E:257a-21: mi gtsang dor bsam sla dar blugs //
T02TD2496E:257a-22: de rjes chu mes de ltar bya //
T02TD2496E:257a-23: yang na g-yam steng chu me dang //
T02TD2496E:257a-24: zho zan bsres dang yungs kar la //
T02TD2496E:257a-25: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2496E:257a-26: zhes bzlas mer bsregs bzhi mdor dor //
T02TD2496E:257a-27: 'dag chal sug pa nye shing pa //
T02TD2496E:257a-28: shu ti sran phye ba yi lnga //
T02TD2496E:257a-29: til mar gyis ni sngags bcas bkru //
T02TD2496E:257a-30: bag chags spyang phyir chu brgyad khrus //
T02TD2496E:257a-31: rdul g-yab me long bstan byas te //
T02TD2496E:257a-32: chab gtsang chu gtsang sman chab dang //
T02TD2496E:257a-34: rin chen mchod yon khrus byas la //
T02TD2496E:257a-35: shing ba la ras kyis sku phyis la //
T02TD2496E:257a-36: dbang stegs steng du bzhugs gsol la //
T02TD2496E:257a-37: mar dang dri lnga ga pur dang //
T02TD2496E:257a-38: tsandan dz'a ti gur gum dang //
T02TD2496E:257a-39: gla rtsi byugs te stong par spyang //
T02TD2496E:257a-40: stong pa'i sngags gsum rim bzhin brjod //
T02TD2496E:257a-41: de nas lhar bskyed dngos de'am //
T02TD2496E:257a-42: dkyil 'khor gang bris yi dam lha //
T02TD2496E:257a-43: gtso 'khor bcas pa'am gtso rkyang ni //
T02TD2496E:257a-44: mngon par byang chub lngas bskyed la //
T02TD2496E:257a-45: rab gnas dbang bskur mnga' gsol gsum //
T02TD2496E:257a-46: rab gnas ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2496E:257a-47: spyan drang chos brgyad snyan gsan dbab //
T02TD2496E:257a-48: spyan drangs bzhugs gsol khrus mchod yon //
T02TD2496E:257b-0: phyag 'tshal sum bsres sku gsung @257b thugs //
T02TD2496E:257b-1: byin gyis brlab pa'i bar du bya //
T02TD2496E:257b-2: de la mchod pa'i rim pa ni //
T02TD2496E:257b-3: rin chen mandala thun mong lnga //
T02TD2496E:257b-4: rgyan dang gzhal yas gdugs rgyal mtshan //
T02TD2496E:257b-5: ba dan 'phan dang bla re dang //
T02TD2496E:257b-6: me tog phreng ba rol mos bskor //
T02TD2496E:257b-7: na bza' nam mkha' mdzod zhal zas //
T02TD2496E:257b-8: gling bzhi mandala dbul bar bya //
T02TD2496E:257b-9: rang rang sngags dang rten 'brel gyi //
T02TD2496E:257b-10: snying po brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas //
T02TD2496E:257b-11: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2496E:257b-12: yi ge brgya pa brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02TD2496E:257b-13: bzlas pas brtan par byed pa yin //
T02TD2496E:257b-14: de dag spyi yi rab gnas te //
T02TD2496E:257b-15: khyad par sku gsung thugs rnams la //
T02TD2496E:257b-16: rang rang cho ga gzhung bsrangs la //
T02TD2496E:257b-17: mchod rten la sogs thugs rten la //
T02TD2496E:257b-18: khyad par chos bzhi byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2496E:257b-19: rdo ring them skas chu srin gyi //
T02TD2496E:257b-20: rgyal mtshan la sogs dbul ba'o //
T02TD2496E:257b-21: byin brlabs sa gzhi chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD2496E:257b-22: seng khri mi 'jigs bzhir byin brlab //
T02TD2496E:257b-23: rmang ni dge bcu khri dpyad ni //
T02TD2496E:257b-24: dad po drang pa nyer gzhag bzhi //
T02TD2496E:257b-25: gnyis pa yang dag spong ba bzhi //
T02TD2496E:257b-26: gsum pa rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi //
T02TD2496E:257b-27: bzhi pa snang ba'i dbang po lnga //
T02TD2496E:257b-28: bum rten stobs lngar byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2496E:257b-29: bum pa byang chub yan lag bdun //
T02TD2496E:257b-30: kha khyer 'phags lam yan lag brgyad //
T02TD2496E:257b-31: de dag rgyu chos byin brlab ste //
T02TD2496E:257b-33: srog shing mkhyen bcu bri legs ni //
T02TD2496E:257b-34: ye shes bzhi dang rnam thar bzhi //
T02TD2496E:257b-35: 'khor lo bcu gsum sa bcu dang //
T02TD2496E:257b-36: dran pa nyer gzhag gsum du brlab //
T02TD2496E:257b-37: char khabs gdugs ni thugs rje'i skyabs //
T02TD2496E:257b-38: tog ni chos dbyings ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2496E:257b-39: phyi ni sku gsum nang gzhal yas //
T02TD2496E:257b-40: rdo ring rin chen them skas dang //
T02TD2496E:257b-41: chu srin rgyal mtshan dar dbyangs dang //
T02TD2496E:257b-42: rin chen phreng ba nyi zla dbul //
T02TD2496E:257b-43: bya ru thabs dang shes rab yin //
T02TD2496E:257b-44: mchod rten sku bsdus rab gnas bya //
T02TD2496E:257b-45: rang rang rab gnas legs par bya //
T02TD2496E:257b-46: sku gzugs khyad par chos brgyad de //
T02TD2496E:257b-47: spyan dbye dbu skra sprul sku'i gzhar //
T02TD2496E:257b-48: longs sku'i dung gi so mang sa bshad //
T02TD2496E:257b-49: shangs dbyes spu 'thog tshems rtsa bru //
T02TD2496E:258a-2: na bza' sprul pa'i sku la ni //
T02TD2496E:258a-3: smad gsum chu tshags par 'khar gsil //
T02TD2496E:258a-4: longs sku zhi la dar gyi ste //
T02TD2496E:258a-5: khro bo'i stag lpags dar sngon gyi //
T02TD2496E:258a-6: stod g-yogs rgyan ni sprul thod sogs //
T02TD2496E:258a-7: sprul sku rgyan med longs zhi la //
T02TD2496E:258a-8: bris bkod dbul bsam cho gas dbul //
T02TD2496E:258a-9: dngos su dbul du yod na rab //
T02TD2496E:258a-10: gsung rab zhal bsro'i khyad par dgu //
T02TD2496E:258a-11: don gsung skye 'gag med par brlab //
T02TD2496E:258a-12: tshig gsung yig 'bru gsung rab ni //
T02TD2496E:258a-13: yan lag tshad med bzhi bcur brlab //
T02TD2496E:258a-14: khri dbul glegs shing glegs thag dbul //
T02TD2496E:258a-15: na bza' zhal khebs rgya rim bdun //
T02TD2496E:258a-16: pha rol phyin pa yum chen mo //
T02TD2496E:258a-17: mdo sde 'dul ba byang chub che //
T02TD2496E:258a-18: rgyud sde rdo rje chos sogs te //
T02TD2496E:258a-19: cho ga yi dam la sogs pa //
T02TD2496E:258a-20: ngo shes bye brag mi shes spyi //
T02TD2496E:258a-21: yang na bden gnyis yi ger bsam //
T02TD2496E:258a-22: dri lnga yis ni de nas byug / sa bon lnga yi gtor bya'i don //
T02TD2496E:258a-23: skye med rtog pa gsal ba yis //
T02TD2496E:258a-24: chos sku la ni chos sku thim //
T02TD2496E:258a-25: gnyis su med bsams me tog dbul //
T02TD2496E:258a-26: thugs kyi mchod pa dri yis byug / de nas spyir ni dbang bcu gcig / bum pa dbu rgyan cod pan dang ;
T02TD2496E:258a-27: / phyag rgya ming dbang las bzhi'i dbang //
T02TD2496E:258a-28: chos kyi rgyal po gsang ba'i dbang //
T02TD2496E:258a-29: thabs shes gdugs dang phreng dbang bskur //
T02TD2496E:258a-30: rjes la mnga' gsol rten kun la //
T02TD2496E:258a-31: rdzas brgyad sna bdun dbul ba dang //
T02TD2496E:258a-32: bkra shis byin cher gsol ba ni //
T02TD2496E:258a-33: 'brang rgyas la sogs bkra shis rdzas //
T02TD2496E:258a-34: mang la 'jig rten dge ba dang //
T02TD2496E:258a-35: mdzad pa bcu gnyis dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2496E:258a-36: rigs lnga la sogs mang po ni //
T02TD2496E:258a-37: bklag dang gyer bas zhal bsro bya //
T02TD2496E:258a-38: gong du cod pan dbang bskur ram //
T02TD2496E:258a-39: yang na sngags 'dis bcing byas te //
T02TD2496E:258a-41: sku yi sum 'gyur khri la ni //
T02TD2496E:258a-42: mdun du ma nub mi yor bzhugs //
T02TD2496E:258a-43: de ltar ma byas skyon mang 'byung //
T02TD2496E:258a-44: de nas slob dpon yon bdag gnyis //
T02TD2496E:258a-45: me tog gtor te gdan khri nas //
T02TD2496E:258a-46: bzung la bzhugs par lan gsum gsol //
T02TD2496E:258b-0: de nas @258b mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sogs //
T02TD2496E:258b-1: bstod pa rgyas bsdus skabs dang sbyar //
T02TD2496E:258b-2: de yi yon tan la dad pas //
T02TD2496E:258b-3: me tog spos dang de bzhin dri //
T02TD2496E:258b-4: mar me lha bshos na bza' sogs //
T02TD2496E:258b-5: sngags ldan rgyas bsdus skabs dang sbyar //
T02TD2496E:258b-6: de nas yon bdag mdun bzhag la ;
T02TD2496E:258b-7: / me tog dri yi mnga' gsol ba //
T02TD2496E:258b-8: rten 'brel snying po zlos bzhin du //
T02TD2496E:258b-9: lha la dbul ba bzhin byas la //
T02TD2496E:258b-10: gzengs bstod mchod pa'i rjes gnang sbyin //
T02TD2496E:258b-11: gsang ba'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2496E:258b-12: phyag na rdo rje 'khor bcas la //
T02TD2496E:258b-13: gtor ma phul la gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2496E:258b-14: spyi yi chos skyong phyogs skyong bcu //
T02TD2496E:258b-15: rnam sras mgon po gzhi bdag la //
T02TD2496E:258b-16: gtor sbyin phrin las bka' bsgo bya //
T02TD2496E:258b-17: phyi rjes bzo bo grogs byed sogs //
T02TD2496E:258b-18: 'di skad brjod de mchod par bya //
T02TD2496E:258b-19: kye gson dga' bas 'di nyid du //
T02TD2496E:258b-20: ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa rnams //
T02TD2496E:258b-21: bdag la mthun pa'i nus pa med //
T02TD2496E:258b-22: de phyir khyed ni bzod par gsol //
T02TD2496E:258b-23: de dag gang dag brtul zhugs can //
T02TD2496E:258b-24: dge slong dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma //
T02TD2496E:258b-25: mchog tu gus pas mchod byas la //
T02TD2496E:258b-26: ji ltar 'os pa'i yon yang dbul //
T02TD2496E:258b-27: rab tu byung ba'i gnas brtan dang //
T02TD2496E:258b-28: khyim pa'i gtso bo la sogs la //
T02TD2496E:258b-29: gnyer gtang bka' bsgo 'di skad brjod //
T02TD2496E:258b-30: snyigs ma lnga yi dus 'di yi //
T02TD2496E:258b-31: mchog gi sku dang mnyam pa yi //
T02TD2496E:258b-32: sprul pa'i sku ni 'di yin gyis //
T02TD2496E:258b-33: khyod kyis ma nyams srung mchod kyis //
T02TD2496E:258b-34: sngags kyi bza' bca' yon bdag la //
T02TD2496E:258b-36: sngags kyi gtsang sbra'i bza' bca' dag / gzugs brnyan bdag po khyod la sbyin //
T02TD2496E:258b-37: bde gshegs lhag ma 'di dag ni //
T02TD2496E:258b-38: zos na sdig pa byang bar 'gyur //
T02TD2496E:258b-39: gal te lhag nyid dge 'dod na //
T02TD2496E:258b-40: bla ma gus pas dge bya zhing //
T02TD2496E:258b-41: de ltar rnam pa thams cad du //
T02TD2496E:258b-42: bla ma yang dag mnyes byas te //
T02TD2496E:258b-43: yon gyi dam pa dbul ba ni //
T02TD2496E:258b-44: rta dang glang po shing rta nor //
T02TD2496E:258b-45: longs spyod yo byad dbul 'di brjod //
T02TD2496E:258b-46: bla ma yongs su mnyes pa yis //
T02TD2496E:258b-47: las dang dngos grub thams cad 'thob //
T02TD2496E:259a-2: bla ma mnyes par byed par shog / de nas mtshan mo gtang rag ste //
T02TD2496E:259a-3: gnyen dang rigs rgyud 'khor rnams kyi //
T02TD2496E:259a-4: bzang ba'i glu gar rol mo ste //
T02TD2496E:259a-5: dung la sogs pa'i rol mo dbul //
T02TD2496E:259a-6: lho phyogs rgyas pa'i thab byas la //
T02TD2496E:259a-7: 'o ma can gyi bud shing brtsig /'bru dang mngar gsum mar 'o mas //
T02TD2496E:259a-8: dang po mjug tu me lha mchod //
T02TD2496E:259a-9: bar du dkyil 'khor rab gnas lha //
T02TD2496E:259a-10: stong ngam lnga brgya sogs sngags 'dis //
T02TD2496E:259a-11: aom badzra a'a yu she pushtam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD2496E:259a-12: sdig zhi tshe dpal rgyas par 'phel //
T02TD2496E:259a-13: gtang rag lhag chad bskang ba yi //
T02TD2496E:259a-14: mchod bstod bzod gsol skabs sbyar bya //
T02TD2496E:259a-15: rten gsar ye shes mi gshegs te //
T02TD2496E:259a-16: ts'a ru'i ston mo rgyas par bya //
T02TD2496E:259a-17: dkyil 'khor lha gshegs dam tshig bsdu //
T02TD2496E:259a-18: rdul tshon aa k'ar sngags bsdus te //
T02TD2496E:259a-19: chu sogs dor la ba'i lngas byug / de nas 'gro rnams dad bya'i phyir //
T02TD2496E:259a-20: shing rta khri sogs mtho bar bteg / mchod pa rol mo dang bcas pas //
T02TD2496E:259a-21: grong khyer rnams su bskor bar bya //
T02TD2496E:259a-22: spros mi dga' la bsdus pa ni //
T02TD2496E:259a-23: bsnyen pas cho ga sta gon dang //
T02TD2496E:259a-24: dkyil 'khor bri sgrub rten gsar la //
T02TD2496E:259a-25: bgegs bskrad yi ge brgyas brtan par //
T02TD2496E:259a-26: gong bzhin spyan dbye la sogs pa //
T02TD2496E:259a-27: nub gcig la ni kun rdzogs bya //
T02TD2496E:259a-28: mnga' gsol rgyas par ma grub kyang //
T02TD2496E:259a-30: shin tu bsdus pa'i rab gnas ni //
T02TD2496E:259a-31: brtan pa thob pa'i slob dpon gyis //
T02TD2496E:259a-32: gza' skar tshes grangs mi brtsi ste //
T02TD2496E:259a-33: rdul tshon mi brten thun gcig la //
T02TD2496E:259a-34: dkyil 'khor bsgoms te brgya rtsa bsnyen //
T02TD2496E:259a-35: bgegs bskrad bkru sogs gong ltar bya //
T02TD2496E:259a-36: bskyed de spyan drangs sku gsung thugs //
T02TD2496E:259a-37: byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2496E:259a-38: snying ga'i sa bon 'od kyis ni ;
T02TD2496E:259a-39: /'og min rigs lnga'i thugs ka nas //
T02TD2496E:259a-40: bkra shis lha mo bum rol bcas //
T02TD2496E:259a-41: dbang bskur rigs bdag rgyas btab bsam //
T02TD2496E:259a-42: rten 'brel snying po brgya rtsa res //
T02TD2496E:259a-43: dri dang me tog gtor byugs te //
T02TD2496E:259a-44: rang rang lha la chos skur thim //
T02TD2496E:259b-0: bsams la rdo rjes mchod @259b bstod bya //
T02TD2496E:259b-1: rjes sogs spyi dang mthun par bya //
T02TD2496E:259b-2: lha khang rab gnas 'dir ma bshad //
T02TD2496E:259b-3: da ni phyag mtshan byin dbab ste //
T02TD2496E:259b-4: sva bh'a'i sngags kyis stong dang las //
T02TD2496E:259b-5: dkar rigs lha khang mchod rten gnas //
T02TD2496E:259b-6: khang khyim bhr'um las 'khor rnam snang //
T02TD2496E:259b-7: gsung rigs dmar dang po ti cod //
T02TD2496E:259b-8: gand'i cha lang dril bu sogs //
T02TD2496E:259b-9: dzri'om las padma snang mtha' yas //
T02TD2496E:259b-10: nag sngo rdo rje phreng thugs //
T02TD2496E:259b-11: h'um las rdo rje mi bskyod pa bskyed //
T02TD2496E:259b-12: ser po bang mdzod yon tan rigs //
T02TD2496E:259b-13: aam las rin chen rin 'byung bskyed //
T02TD2496E:259b-14: las rigs ljang gu rgya gram gri //
T02TD2496E:259b-15: kham las ral gris don yod grub //
T02TD2496E:259b-16: chos skyong rnams la'ang rang rang gis //
T02TD2496E:259b-18: rigs kyi 'bag la rang rang lhas //
T02TD2496E:259b-19: ngo mi shes kun de 'drar re'am //
T02TD2496E:259b-20: rigs bstun gong gis shes par bya //
T02TD2496E:259b-21: srog chags gtso bo'i sprul skus bya ;
T02TD2496E:259b-22: / srung 'khor kun dga' rab bkad sa //
T02TD2496E:259b-23: gzhal yas khang dam aa mo li //
T02TD2496E:259b-24: chu mig khron sogs m'a ma k'i //
T02TD2496E:259b-25: bza' shing ra dang ldum ra sogs //
T02TD2496E:259b-27: phyugs lhas parna sha ba ri //
T02TD2496E:259b-29: yon bdag dkyil 'khor mthong na lha //
T02TD2496E:259b-30: ma mthong ni ni sprul skus bya //
T02TD2496E:259b-31: bla ma'i sku 'bag thugs dam ste //
T02TD2496E:259b-32: mi shes rang gi yi dam las //
T02TD2496E:259b-33: sngags la ma zhugs sprul pa'i sku //
T02TD2496E:259b-34: kun la dgug gzhug gong bzhin bya //
T02TD2496E:259b-35: phrin las rgyas pa'i cho ga ste //
T02TD2496E:259b-37: bdag gis rang bzor ma byas te //
T02TD2496E:259b-38: gtso cher klu sgrub lugs gtsor bzhag / rdo rje 'chang nas gnyis brgyud pa'i //
T02TD2496E:259b-39: lung dang 'dra ba'i n'a ro dang //
T02TD2496E:259b-40: byang chub sems las thob pa yi //
T02TD2496E:259b-41: sgeg pa rdo rje skal ldan mchog / de gsum snyan nas snyan brgyud pa'i //
T02TD2496E:259b-42: man ngag bla ma mnyes pas thob //
T02TD2496E:259b-43: rgyud dang bstan bcos legs brten nas //
T02TD2496E:259b-44: rang nyid dran pa gso ba dang //
T02TD2496E:259b-45: gzhan yang bdag 'dra gti mug la //
T02TD2496E:259b-46: phan phyir gzhan gyis bskul nas bris //
T02TD2496E:259b-47: ma rtogs nongs pa bzod par gsol //
T02TD2496E:260a-1: pa'i dge ba cung zad des //
T02TD2496E:260a-2: sems can bde chen sku thob shog / sku dang gsung dang thugs rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2496E:260a-4: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam ka ra dang //
T02TD2496E:260a-5: lo ts'a ba rgya brtson seng ges bi kra ma sh'i lar bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
